data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Kamrup Metropolitan, Assam, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kamrup Metropolitan, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 10,203 believers in Kamrup Metropolitan that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Kamrup Metropolitan that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Kamrup Metropolitan, Assam, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Loi people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, encourage the church in Kamrup Metropolitan, Assam, India to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Kamrup Metropolitan.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kamrup Metropolitan, Assam, India has a population of 927,500.

We estimate Kamrup Metropolitan has 10,203 people who might know Jesus, 11,254 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 906,044 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 10,203 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

location.name: Kamrup Metropolitan
location.people_groups_list: Bhunar, Darjee, Ganak, Bania Brittal, Tai Darai
